dialogue.htmlContent:
[style.italicsBad(Please be aware that a lot of the scenes in this area still has placeholder dialogue! It will be filled in for the next update.)]

Deciding that you want to head inside 'The Crossed Blades', you approach the entrance to the tavern and push open the old, wooden door. Although the rusty hinges produce an ear-splitting screech in protest, this unpleasant noise is drowned out by the rowdy shouting, laughing, and cursing which fills the tavern's gloomy, smoky interior. [pc.Stepping] forwards and letting the door swing shut behind you, you pause for a moment to take in the scene before you.

The tavern's large, open-plan floorspace is filled with dozens of mismatched tables and chairs of varying shapes and sizes. Around these tables can be seen a mix of patrons every bit as diverse as the furniture that they're seated upon, and apart from creating a huge amount of noise, this crowd can be seen to be engaged in drinking, eating, smoking, arguing, kissing, slapping, and, in just a couple of instances, drunkenly fucking. Although a few of the closest individuals stop and give you a look as you enter the tavern, their business is far more interesting than something as minor as your entrance, and they quickly return to their previous conversation.

After you've taken a moment to look upon the wild scene before you, you move your gaze to the other parts of the tavern. Opposite to where you're standing, and separated from the entrance by several occupied tables, you see what looks to be the tavern's bar. You also note that around the edges of the large, open-plan floorspace, dimly-lit seating looks to be populated by a different sort of clientèle, who look far less happy and considerably more dangerous than the people who are seated at the tables.

Taking another [pc.step] forwards into the warm, smoky atmosphere of the tavern's gloomy interior, you wonder whether to head over to the bar to perhaps order a drink, or maybe instead to turn around and head back outside...
Finding yourself once again at the tavern's main entrance, you wonder whether to push open the old, wooden door and head back outside, or perhaps to turn around and return to the bar...

Deciding that you've had enough of the tavern's gloomy, smoky atmosphere, you push open the old, wooden door and, ignoring the screeching, grinding sound of the rusty hinges, [pc.step] back out into the relatively fresh air of Elis's alleyways...

#IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_oglix_introduced))

As you [pc.step] into the tavern, you hear a loud, womanly voice shouting out, [oglix.speech(You! Hey, you! Yeah, the [pc.race] who just came in! Get over here so I can say hello!)]

Realising that the you're the one that this voice is calling out for, you look over towards the source and see that it's coming from the tavern's bar. Your first thought as you see the person who's shouting out and waving at you is to wonder how you didn't immediately notice her upon your entry. Standing at [oglix.heightValue] tall, and with a remarkable shade of green skin, this black-haired woman looks startlingly similar to a generic orc from some kind of fantasy setting. Wearing a black, tie-up croptop, which is struggling to contain her massive pair of [oglix.cupSize]-cup breasts, and black hotpants, her arms, legs, and stomach are left fully exposed, allowing you to see that they're extremely muscular. Although she's lacking horns, wings, or a tail, you quickly deduce from her flawless skin, attractive features, and green skin-tone that she must be a succubus.

[oglix.speech(I haven't got all day!)] she booms in a loud voice which perfectly matches her huge, muscular appearance. Flashing you a big grin, she waves you forwards and jokes, [oglix.speech(I don't bite!)]

#ELSE

The tavern's large interior is absolutely packed full of tables and chairs, almost every one of which is occupied by several of the tavern's huge number of noisy, drunk patrons. As such, you have to squeeze and push past dozens of people as you [pc.walk] forwards, which not only slows your progress, but also causes many curses and angry looks to be thrown your way. Ignoring their reactions, you continue on your way through the tavern's smoky, gloomy interior...

#ENDIF
As you pass by a table, you see that there's someone kneeling beneath it, and from the bobbing movement of their upper torso, it's quite obvious that they're performing oral...

Your path takes you past a moaning [style.random(cat-girl|dog-girl|rat-girl|fox-girl|horse-girl|cow-girl)], who's sitting in her partner's lap with her skirt pulled up above her waist. You can't help but notice that she's not wearing any underwear, and her partner's thick cock is stuffed balls-deep inside her wet cunt...

You find yourself [pc.walking] past a couple of [style.random(cat-girls|dog-girls|rat-girls|fox-girls|horse-girls|cow-girls)], who, to the great amusement of the rest of their table's occupants, are passionately making out with one another...

One of the tables which you [pc.walk] past is occupied by a particularly rowdy group of [style.random(cat-boys|dog-boys|rat-boys|fox-boys|horse-boys|bull-boys)], who let out a deafening cheer as a passing [style.random(cat-girl|dog-girl|rat-girl|fox-girl|horse-girl|cow-girl)], who's quite clearly drunk, pulls up her top to flash them her huge tits...
A drunk [style.random(cat-boy|dog-boy|rat-boy|fox-boy|horse-boy|bull-boy)] shouts out an incomprehensible curse as you push pass, before collapsing face-first onto the table before him...

You overhear a drunk [style.random(cat-girl|dog-girl|rat-girl|fox-girl|horse-girl|cow-girl)] loudly declaring to her table that she's going up to the bar to order another round of drinks as you pass her by...

Seeing no harm in introducing yourself to this orc-like succubus, who you assume must be the owner of this tavern, you take a winding path past several noisy tables and head over to the long, wooden bar. As you approach, you notice that this green-skinned succubus has orange eyes, and is wearing a pair of gold earrings and a golden nose ring. As she stands up at full height and flashes you a toothy grin, you see two pairs of distinctive bumps pressing out from beneath her croptop, letting you know that she's not wearing a bra and has a couple of barbell piercings through her nipples.

[oglix.speech(I'm Oglix, the owner of this dump,)] the succubus booms in her loud, slovenly-accented voice, before letting out a thunderous laugh and declaring, [oglix.speech(I haven't seen you in here before! I like to know the names of everyone who comes in here, so what's yours, [pc.race]?)]

As you give Oglix your name, you suddenly notice that there's a swirling cloud of grey energy hovering a little way behind the succubus. Seeing what it is you're looking at, Oglix gestures towards this wisp and reveals, [oglix.speech(This is my elemental, Golix. Come on, say hello, Golix!)]

[oglixElemental.speech(Hello, [pc.name],)] the wisp replies in a rather emotionless, feminine voice, before somewhat-alarmingly stating, [oglixElemental.speech(I hope that mistress orders me to punish you. You're just the sort of [pc.race] I love to stuff with my fat cock.)]

[oglix.speech(Oh, don't mind her,)] Oglix says, [oglix.speech(I only get Golix to punish people who deserve it. Sometimes the drink's too much for some, you see, and so now and again we get a brawl break out. I keep order in this place by having Golix here take on her active form and fuck whoever doesn't stop when I say so.)]

As if this wasn't alarming enough, you suddenly catch sight of another oddity behind the bar. Alongside the shelving which looks to hold a very limited selection of rum, whiskey, and vodka, a huge wooden barrel has been half-set into the wall. A section has been cut out of this barrel, and hanging out so as to be completely exposed to the tavern, a pair of huge, [beerBitch.cupSize]-cup breasts, with a couple of milking pumps sucking on their massive, puffy nipples, are rather wildly bouncing up and down.

[oglix.speech(Oh, that's just the beer-bitch,)] Oglix explains with a wave of her hand as she sees what it is you're looking at now. Reaching over to give one of this beer-bitch's tits a squeeze, she explains, [oglix.speech(Her milk's been transformed to be just the same as beer. She gets milked, her beer-milk gets cooled through the machine that's milking her, and then it's served to anyone who orders a pint. Oh, and her tits are bouncing like that because someone's fucking her at the moment.)]

At that moment, you hear the sound of a loud grunt, followed by a horny squeal, coming from the other side of the wooden barrel. With that, the beer-bitch's tits stop bouncing, and Oglix states, [oglix.speech(Sounds like they just gave her a big creampie. You can have a go at fucking her too; I give out a token with every pint of beer that's sold, and if you trade in five tokens then you get to go around back and fuck the beer-bitch. So, you want to order a pint, [pc.name]?)]

Looking over at the milk that's being sucked out of the beer-bitch's nipples, you think to yourself that its colour and consistency do look exactly like regular beer. Looking back over at Oglix, you wonder whether to order anything, or perhaps ask her a question or two...
The bar. Oglix squeezes one of the beer bitches' tits and asks if you want a drink.
You ask Oglix about her background. She says that she moved here to Elis a long time ago, and after a while she bought this place and decided to turn it into a tavern.
You ask Oglix what she thinks of Lunette. She reveals that Lunette is her grandmother, and doesn't have a bad word to say about her.

You ask Oglix about her beer-bitch and how she came to own her. Oglix says that she was repeatedly stealing from the tavern, and after punishing her numerous times she still didn't get the message. Someone else had reported her to the Enforcers, and so she was on the wanted list, so Oglix decided to get a slaver license and enslave her.

Oglix then had a great deal of fun creating some transformation potions, making the beer-bitch lactate beer, as well as making her love her situation. She's forgotten the thief's original name, but 'beer-bitch' suits her very well.

#IF(!pc.hasQuest(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_OGLIX_BEER_BARRELS)) Looking at the relatively large amount of space beside the beer-bitch's barrel, Oglix says that she planned to add more, but never got around to it... #ELSEIF(!pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_OGLIX_BEER_BARRELS)) Looking at the relatively large amount of space beside the beer-bitch's barrel, Oglix grunts that it's taking you a long time to get those barrels she's after... #ELSE Looking at the four extra barrels beside the beer-bitch's original one, Oglix grins and thanks you again for getting them for her... #ENDIF

You ask Oglix about Golix. If player has elemental, she comments on it. She says that she went through arcane training earlier in her life, and learned how to summon Golix back then. Golix turned out to have a thing for dominantly fucking people, which suits Oglix as she likes to watch it.

Asks Oglix if she can have you, which Oglix waves off with a laugh. #ELSE Golix floats up next to you and says that she wants to punish you with her fat cock. Asks Oglix if she can have you, which Oglix waves off with a laugh. #ENDIF

Raising her eyebrow, Oglix says that if you're interested, she wouldn't mind watching Golix fuck you...

She grunts in amusement, but when she sees that you're serious, she thinks for a moment and says that she'll take you up on your offer of help. Says that the only place which has barrels large enough to fit a person are those at the tavern, 'The Centaur's Sword', due to the tauric clientèle drinking huge amounts.

She tells you to go to this tavern and ask the owner, Kheiron, for four of the largest barrels he's got. Golix cuts in at this point, and says in her emotionless voice that if he refuses, or tries to ask for payment for them, to simply say that 'Golix says to be a good horsie'.

Oglix laughs at this, and confirms that that'd ought to do it. Perhaps you'll find out what it means another time, but for now, just use that phrase. Asks if you want a drink before you go.

You tell Oglix that you'd like a pint of beer from [npc.namePos] tits and hand over forty flames. Flashing you a grin, she steps over and turns on the pump, causing a muffled, erotic moan to burst out from [npc.namePos] barrel. Filling a pint glass with the [npc.race]'s beer-like milk, Oglix turns off the pump and gives [npc.her] [npc.cupSize]-cup tits a quick slap, before placing the glass down on the bar in front of you.

As you drink the glass of milk, which looks, smells, and tastes identical to beer, Oglix flicks a bottle cap your way, saying that it's a beer token. Collect five, and you can trade them in to fuck [npc.name].

You tell Oglix that you'd like a glass of vodka and hand over a hundred flames. Pouring out a glass, the green-skinned succubus places it on the stained counter in front of you. Relaxing and taking your time to drink your vodka, you wonder whether to order another drink or to do something else...

You tell Oglix that you'd like a glass of rum and hand over a hundred and twenty flames. Pouring out a glass, the green-skinned succubus places it on the stained counter in front of you. Relaxing and taking your time to drink your rum, you wonder whether to order another drink or to do something else...

You tell Oglix that you'd like a glass of whiskey and hand over a hundred and twenty flames. Pouring out a glass, the green-skinned succubus places it on the stained counter in front of you. Relaxing and taking your time to drink your whiskey, you wonder whether to order another drink or to do something else...

Seeing that there's a food menu hanging on the wall behind the bar, you ask Oglix if you can order [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]. Grunting in confirmation, she taps the board where it says the price. Handing over [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1] flames, you wait while your order is given to the kitchen and cooked.

Ten minutes later, and your food arrives. Although not the best-presented plate of food you've ever seen, it tastes good enough, and so you happily spend the next ten minutes eating your [#SPECIAL_PARSE_2]. After you're done, Oglix takes your plate and quite literally throws it into the kitchen, causing a loud smashing noise and a couple of curses to ring out through the door as it swings shut.

Leaning down on the counter, Oglix asks if there's anything else you want.

You ask to be punished, Oglix smirks and agrees to play along. Orders Golix to punish you.

Golix takes her active form, and roughly pushes you down over a nearby table, sending drinks flying. Hefting her huge, stone cock in one hand, she uses her free one to forcefully slap your [pc.ass+], before stating in her emotionless voice that she's going to enjoy punishing you.

With that, you hastily get your things back in order and return to the bar...

Staggering back over to the bar, you lean against the counter as Oglix smirks and asks if you enjoyed your punishment.

You reply in the positive, causing the green-skinned succubus to let out a booming laugh. She asks if you want anything to drink.

Golix says she's ready to go again; she could stuff you with her fat cock all day and never get tired of it.

You tell Oglix that you want to fuck [npc.name] and hand over five tokens. Flashing you a smirk, the green-skinned succubus opens the door at the far end of the bar, telling you to go through and take your time.

Golix says that she knew Kheiron would be a good horsie for her. Golix assumes her active form and moves off to do as she's told. Oglix calls out that she can take some time to personally tell Kheiron what a good horsie he is. Golix's fat cock immediately rises to attention as she hears this, and without a word she swiftly departs.

Using telekinesis once again, she patches up the edges so as to make the barrel fit snugly in the gap.

You and Oglix continue to chat while Golix repeats this process for the other three barrels. Finished, Golix transforms back into her wisp form, before telling Oglix that Kheiron is still very much keen to continue being a good horsie for her at the usual time every day.

Oglix smirks at this and tells you that as a reward for getting these barrels, you can sneak around to the old stables at the rear of the tavern between [units.time(6)]-[units.time(7)] in the morning. Don't be seen; Kheiron hates people knowing what Golix does to him.

Looking over at the barrels, you ask Oglix where she's going to get new beer-bitches to fill them from.

Oglix tells you to bring slave candidates to her. There are plenty running around in the alleyways, so it shouldn't be too hard to find some. Bring them to her, and she'll enslave them, get them transformed, and give them their new life as a beer-bitch.

[style.italicsMinorGood(After defeating muggers or prostitutes in the nearby alleyways, you'll now able to send up to four of them to Oglix to permanently become beer-bitches!)]

Oglix asks if you want something to drink before setting out to find her some nice new slaves...

You drag [npc.name] to 'The Crossed Blades', through the entrance, and all the way to the bar. Oglix flashes you a delighted grin as she sees what it is that you've brought her.

Oglix commands Golix to strip this [npc.race] naked and pin [npc.herHim] to the wall. Golix enthusiastically responds, taking on her active form and roughly tearing off [npc.namePos] clothing.

To one side of the bar, there's an old, wooden door which bears a crooked sign, reading: 'Kitchens - Staff Only!'. [pc.Stepping] forwards, you cast a glance through the door's small, grimy window to see a rather unhygienic-looking assortment of worn tables, greasy ovens, and dented fridges. Food waste, dirty pans, and scrunched up packaging are strewn across almost every surface, while the floor and walls are splattered with all sorts of oils and sauces.

The people responsible for letting this kitchen get into such a state take the form of two young, busty succubi, who from the green shade of their skin are undoubtedly Oglix's daughters. Smoking and chatting to one another, these succubi are leaving all of the work to the third and final occupant of the room, who takes the form of a male human who looks to be in his late teens. Rushing around the kitchen in a state of overworked stress, this poor chef's work is made even harder by the fact that the two succubi cruelly attempt to trip him up or blow smoke in his face each time he's forced to pass them.

Turning away from the kitchen to face the equally-chaotic tavern, you duck as a carelessly-hurled bottle flies over your head to smash against a nearby wall. A sharp shout from Oglix produces an apologetic reply from the bottle's origin, and as the guilty party hurries to pick up the shards of glass, you [pc.step] past them and wonder where to go next...

After you've finished, you flush the toilet before making your way over to one of the sinks and washing your [pc.hands]. Grabbing a paper towel from the nearby dispenser, you quickly dry yourself off, before turning to face the room and wondering what to do next...

Feeling like you could do with having a quick clean, you step over to the sinks and thoroughly wash your [pc.hands], before splashing some water on your [pc.face]. Grabbing a paper towel from the nearby dispenser, you quickly dry yourself off, before turning to face the room and wondering what to do next...

Dimly-lit seating areas around the edges of the tavern. The occupants all look to be thuggish brutes or scheming gang members.
